org.apache.cassandra.db.index.composites

Class CompositesIndexOnCollectionKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.SecondaryIndex
      • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.PerColumnSecondaryIndex
        • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.AbstractSimplePerColumnSecondaryIndex
          • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.composites.CompositesIndex
            • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.composites.CompositesIndexIncludingCollectionKey
              • org.apache.cassandra.db.index.composites.CompositesIndexOnCollectionKey

  • public class CompositesIndexOnCollectionKey
extends CompositesIndexIncludingCollectionKey
    Index on the collection element of the cell name of a collection. The row keys for this index are given by the collection element for indexed columns.
